column1: Table 2. Percent distribution of employment and payrolls for the justice system, by level of government, March 2017
Series title: Justice Expenditure and Employment Extracts, 2017 - Preliminary NCJ 300017
Data source: Justice Expenditure and Employment Extracts Program (JEEE)
Author: Emily D. Buehler, Ph.D., BJS Statistician
Table 2. Percent distribution of employment and payrolls for the justice system, by level of government, March 2017
Total justice system - Full-time equivalent employment
Judicial and legal - Full-time equivalent employment

Note: The federal budget source provides only total employment for the federal government. That figure is included in the denominator used to compute the percent distribution of full-time employees and full-time equivalent employment for state and local governments.
